\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{texcalc}
\begin{document}

\begin{calc}
x=f(23.55,0.02)
#r 23.55+/-0.02
def foo(x):
	y=x**2
	return y

z=33
#r 33
foo(z)
#r 1089
y=f(222.0,22)
#r 222.0+/-22.0

a=f(24423.0,220)
#r 222.0+/-22.0
\end{calc}

$$x=\val[5]{x}$$
$$\val{x} = x$$
$$\val{foo(x)} = x^2$$
$$\val{z} = z$$
$$y=\val{y}$$
$$a=\val{a}$$

\end{document}
